DataElement.preferredName: Patient Platinum Compound Chemotherapy Regimen Recurrent Disease Disease Progression Diagnosis Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date of the diagnosis of disease recurrence and/or progression following a platinum-based chemotherapy regimen.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Platinum Compound Chemotherapy Regimen Recurrent Disease Disease Progression Diagnosis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the diagnosis of disease recurrence and/or progression following a platinum-based chemotherapy regimen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Platinum Compound Chemotherapy Regimen Recurrent Disease Disease Progression Diagnosis
Property.preferredDefinition: Inorganic compounds which contain platinum as the central atom.:No Value Exists:the return of a sign, symptom, or disease after a remission.:Cancer that continues to grow or spread.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Concepts.definition: A chemotherapy compound that contains a platinum atom. Platinum compounds do not contain alkyl groups but do cause DNA crosslinks and adducts similar to alkylating agents. DNA crosslinks and adducts ultimately lead to the induction of apoptosis.
Any regimen that can be used for the treatment of cancer and non-neoplastic disease.
The return of a disease after a period of remission.
A process that manifests as the worsening of a disease over time.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to GOG for REBOYJ by script Thu Aug 1 14:45:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
